lyrics:
3 contributorscodeine pills part one lyricsintro
every time you come to town we wind up doin the same thing
gettin high and runnin around blame you tend on placing

verse 1
i remember wakin up with you i wish youd leave me layin
prayin godll get us through the bills we aint been payin
i hear a lot of people talk about you i cant hear what theyre sayin
youre not used to stickin around youve grown accustomed to the stayin

verse 2
every time you come to town we wind up doin the same thing
gettin high and runnin around the blame you tend on placing
and are you happy now anita now that youre finally free
when you said that you were leavin and only comin back for me

chorus
cheap booze and codeine pills aint worth all the losin
nothin can come between us damn the life worth choosin
cheap booze and codeine pills aint worth all the losin
nothin can come between us damn the life worth choosin

verse 3
daddy says ive lost mind and my momma shed be grievin
your face down in a bathroom stall with vices planned on keepin
are you happy now anita now that youre finally free
when you said that you were leavin and only comin back for me
see zach bryan liveget tickets as low as 29you might also likechorus
cheap booze and codeine pills aint worth all the losin
cause nothin can come between us damn the life worth choosin
cheap booze and codeine pills aint worth all the losin
nothin can come between us damn the life worth choosin

outro
every time you come to town we wind up doin the same thing
gettin high and running around blame you tend on placinembed
